::KitKat/DarkMouse::

KitKat::
She watched as Scorponok ran off.  She hoped he would be successful 
in what ever he had in mind.  She turned and went to her room and 
layed down on the bed and fell asleep in wolf mode.

DarkMouse::
She sat there and wondered how much she could take now that she had 
this new gift.  She layed down and looked at the drone. "Go away.  I 
don't want you to be here right now."  The drone left her room.  She 
stood up next to the bed and let go of it.  She walked very slowly 
around the room.  She smiled,"Yup, I think I can make this work for 
me."  She went back to the bed and layed down again.  The shaking 
came back, but it was worse this time.  She hoped it would it go away 
like Black Aracnia said it would.  She closed her eyes and waited for 
the shaking to stop.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, crow_lord@h... wrote:
> Scorponok/Sniper
> 
> 
> Scorponok looks at KitKat, "I will go, but first I will put a bomb 
on 
> me so if they attack me, I will blow them up." Scopronok walks to 
his 
> lab and walks out with a backpack on his back. "I shall be off."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Sniper aims his rifle at Oblitron's wounds. He fires 2 times.
